data.description:
SAS is a leader in data and AI, inspiring customers to transform data into intelligence. The Learning Data Science Intern will engage in meaningful work, focusing on using data to enhance learner engagement with SAS Education resources through experiments and analysis.


Responsibilities

  • Participate in the design, execution and review of data experiments
  • Write or modify code or data queries to support usage analysis
  • Create or maintain visualizations and reports that communicate findings
  • Interface with business stakeholders to understand their needs and/or convey results

Skills

  • Currently pursuing a Master's Degree
  • Targeted majors: Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics or Statistics
  • Programming experience: SAS, SQL and/or Python
  • You're curious, passionate, authentic, and accountable. These are our values and influence everything we do
  • Strong communication skills – both written and verbal
  • Leadership abilities. Your past experiences demonstrate you'll take initiative and go above and beyond the call of duty
  • You're interested in the future of Analytics and embrace technology
  • Data experiment design
  • GIT-based code repositories such as GitHub, GitLab, etc
  • SAS Programming (Data Step, Macro, SQL), Data Visualization
  • Technical Support applications such as JIRA, ServiceNow, etc
  • Report Visualization applications such as SAS Visual Analytics, Tableau, Power BI, etc

Benefits

  • Free SAS programming training and certification.
  • Flexible work is the norm.
  • Enjoy hackathons, social events and other opportunities to connect + engage.
  • Your well-being matters, and that’s why we support all dimensions of your well-being by offering programs that reduce stress and distractions to help you stay healthy and productive.
  • This includes an on-site and remote Work/Life Center staffed by master’s level social workers and an Employee Assistance Program.

Company Overview

  • SAS provides advanced business analytics and business intelligent software and services to enable companies to optimize their operations. It was founded in 1976, and is headquartered in Cary, North Carolina, USA, with a workforce of 10001+ employees. Its website is http://www.sas.com.
